attributes.action: Cut Footballers wages to £250 a week, give what they COULD of earned to the NHS.
attributes.background: The England Football team earns roughly £2,002,096 a week in wages.. to get destroyed by Iceland who earns an extremely small fraction compared. Why are our Footballers getting paid this much? Let's limit them & give £103,861,992 a year to our NHS instead? They might play properly then, win win.
